attributes.action: hold a general election forthwith to return the country to democratic control
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current Prime Minister seized power of the country by deposing the incumbent and duly elected Prime Minister, and then took unlawful control of running the United Kingdom without election by the voters of this country,  and as such, to return the country to democratic and lawful rule; he must henceforth call a general election.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
